item.description:
Summertime Means Picnic Time!

WHEN: Sunday June 26

EVENT: Please join us for a Picnic will again be at Lars Anderson Park in Brookline (follow link for google map showing parking and picnic locations). Planning is underway... if you have any suggestions to help make this another great event, or if you'd like to volunteer to help, please let us know. Food and drink will be provided. Bring along lawn chairs, blankets, sunscreen, outdoor games, etc... we'll have a few picnic tables at the picnic site, but they'll be mostly taken up with the food and drink. 

TC:  Picnic organizers

RSVP: To the  Picnic organizers by June 21st to help us plan food and beverage purchases. In case of rain, an alternate (indoor) location will be provided to registered attendees (make sure to include your email address and/or phone so you can be reached).

COST: $10 for Mosaic members, $15 for non-members (new members who join at the picnic attend for free!)

Registration and payment may be made by PayPal (use the button in the  Picnic Event page on the website), or at the Picnic. 

Anyone not sure of their membership status can contact  Jeff Sussman; membership information can be found  on the website.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Mosaic signs posted in the Park

group.name: Mosaic Jewish Outdoor Club of Massachusetts

item.name: A picnic
